overview:
LEVEL X Computer Repair is a full service laptop repair company providing component level repair on Microsoft Windows laptops to companies and individuals all over the United States and Canada. We offer free diagnostics and estimates with no hidden fees. If we don’t repair your laptop, you don’t pay!

LEVEL X Computer Repairâ€™s technicians have the ability to repair or replace LCD screens, motherboards, power jacks, audio jacks, inverters, backlights, bezels, hinges, Wi-Fi cards, keyboards, touchpads or trackpads, USB ports, DVD-ROM or CD-ROM drives, and more.
